summary: I HAD THE CLOCK SPRING REPLACED AND PAID FOR IT OUT OF POCKET.  THEN SIX MONTHS LATER THERE IS A RECALL. I SENT ALL THE BILLS TO CHRYSLER AND NEVER GOT ANY MONEY.  SENT IN TOW DAYS AFTER RECALL NOTICE RECEIVED. I AM ALSO CALLING CHRYSLER BUT YOU NEED TO KNOW THEY ARE TRYING NOT TO PAY THIS. *JB
